import {useState} from 'react' const Reviews = ({}) => { const [state, setState] = useState({ index: 0 }) const {index} = state const handleSlides = () => { const slides = document.querySelectorAll('.reviews-slider-slide'); setState({...state, index: index + 1}) slides.forEach( (slide) => { slide.style.display = 'none' }) console.log(slides) console.log(index) slides[index].style.display = 'block' } return (
